title: Banana Cream Pie in a Jar
directions: Make pudding: In a small bowl, mix together pudding mix with milk and let set 5 minutes. (For best results, transfer pudding to a piping bag.)
Among four mason jars, layer crushed Nilla Wafers, vanilla pudding, and bananas, alternating until you reach the top of the jar.
Top with whipped cream and whole Nilla Wafers and serve.
ingredients: 3 c. finely crushed Mini Nilla Wafers, plus whole ones for garnish
